heading: Anicaâ€™s Claim Dungeon Guide
content: Anica's Claim is a fast dungeon featuring the highly valuable which is important for Druid leveling. It has simple objectives, and requires completing the stronghold to unlock. While every dungeon has a somewhat randomized layout, there are patterns to where objectives and bosses are located. This map will help you identify those layouts so you can complete dungeons faster and maximize your XP and loot per hour! This dungeon is not accessible until you cleanse out the evil in the . This unlocks the Dungeon along with potential vendors and trainers. This can be done solo, but goes by quicker with a group of friends. Reviewed by
